text: The canton of Hénin-Beaumont-1 is an administrative division of the Pas-de- Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Hénin- Beaumont.Décret n° 2014-233 du 24 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Pas-de-Calais It consists of the following communes: #Dourges #Hénin-Beaumont (partly) #Montigny-en-Gohelle #Oignies ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas-de-Calais
title: Canton of Hénin-Beaumont-1
